strings.affinity:
Thank you for always trusting in me.
I wasn't very confident at first,
but thanks to you I grew stronger.
strings.description: A novice mercenary seeking to further hone her skills. Although most novice warriors who seek to quickly improve their fighting skills join the army or become knights under the wing of their nation, Camille chose to gain experience by relentlessly vanquishing beasts on her own. Her hard work has gained her the admiration of various veteran mercenaries who have seen her in action.
strings.fusion:
I'm not sure, but...
As long as I can get stronger, I'm happy.
So thanks for this, I guess!
strings.summon:
I will accept your request!
My dream is to gain experience and grow stronger!

strings.evolution:
Hmph...I feel more able...
I guess this is what you call awakening.
strings.affinity:
Thank you for always trusting in me.
I wasn't very confident at first,
but thanks to you I grew stronger.
strings.description: A mercenary who is gradually becoming more popular thanks to her resilience. Camille's fast improvement in the art of battle cannot be solely attributed to her genuine desire to become stronger, but also to her astonishingly quick learning rate. Although she initially held no interest for international affairs, her missions on the field opened her eyes to the suffering of the people. This sprung within her the desire to begin protecting others.
strings.fusion:
I have to keep trying.
That's all there is to becoming stronger.
strings.summon:
I am Camille.
Whether it be bodyguard duty or pest control,
leave all your mercenary duties to me.

strings.evolution:
I feel as if my skills have sharpened...
This is what it feels like to grow stronger.
strings.affinity:
Thank you for always trusting in me.
I wasn't very confident at first,
but thanks to you I grew stronger.
strings.description: A novice mercenary of great talent. Camille's desire to protect others sprung from the people she witnessed suffering as she carried out her missions. Recognizing her resilient personality and determination, Amelia from the Zoldaad Empire invited her to join a special group of warriors as their commander to carry out missions for the imperial family whilst traveling the world.
strings.fusion:
If I can keep becoming stronger,
then I'll be able to fight alongside the
rest of you in defending the world.
strings.summon:
You want me to help save the world?!
...All right, then.
My power is yours!
